mapper.select: select notice_time, notice_type, notice_title from (select rownum as rnum, sub.* from (select * from LectureNotice where lecture_id = #{lectureId} and lecture_class = #{lectureClass} order by notice_time) sub) where rnum >= #{startIdx} and rnum <= #{endIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into LectureNotice (notice_time, lecture_id, lecture_class, notice_type, notice_title, notice_content) values (sysdate, #{lectureId}, #{lectureClass}, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
